message: Bob, I have a very special product for you that I believe will be of immense value to your business. It's worth at least $1,000,000 to me, and I know it has the potential to be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,050,000. This is a limited-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal. Let me know what you think.
